events.label: Inbound Event
events.name: inboundEvent
events.description: Event send for the endpoint each time that a POST request to the root path of the web service.

events.label: On Download Complete
events.name: onDownloadComplete
events.description: Callback event for when upload of a file has finished

events.label: On Upload Finished
events.name: onUploadComplete
events.description: Callback event for when upload of a file has finished

functions.label: Ping
functions.name: ping
functions.description: The service returns the sent value for the Pong event

functions.label: Error
functions.name: error
functions.description: Always throws an exception after to try to execute a method that throws a generic exception.

functions.label: Find And Save Document
functions.name: findAndSaveDocument
functions.description: Finds a document in a datastore and then update it.If not found, it will create a new one

functions.label: Async Download Of File
functions.name: asyncDownloadFileFromEndpoint
functions.description: Downloads a file from the app asynchronously

functions.label: Sync Download Of File
functions.name: syncDownloadFileFromEndpoint
functions.description: Downloads a file from the app synchronously

functions.label: Async Upload Of File
functions.name: asyncUploadFileFromEndpoint
functions.description: Uploads a dummy file to the app asynchronously

functions.label: Sync Upload Of File
functions.name: syncUploadFileFromEndpoint
functions.description: Uploads a dummy file from the app synchronously
